products.name: Rustic Oak Dining Table
products.description: Hand-crafted dining table made from solid oak with a beautiful natural finish
products.shortDescription: A timeless dining table that brings warmth and character to your dining space

materials.name: Solid Oak
materials.description: Sustainably sourced oak wood, known for its durability and beautiful grain pattern

materials.name: Natural Finish
materials.description: Water-resistant protective coating that enhances the wood's natural beauty

images.alt: Rustic Oak Dining Table - Front View

careInstructions: Dust regularly with a soft, dry cloth
Clean spills immediately with a slightly damp cloth
Use coasters to prevent water rings
Avoid direct sunlight to prevent fading

sustainability.materials: FSC-certified wood from responsibly managed forests

products.name: Modern Walnut Bed Frame
products.description: Contemporary bed frame crafted from premium walnut wood with integrated storage
products.shortDescription: A sleek and functional bed frame that combines modern design with practical storage solutions

materials.name: Premium Walnut
materials.description: Hand-selected walnut wood known for its rich color and durability

materials.name: Steel Hardware
materials.description: High-grade steel components for enhanced stability

images.alt: Modern Walnut Bed Frame - Front View

careInstructions: Dust regularly with a soft, dry cloth
Avoid placing bed in direct sunlight
Clean storage drawers with a damp cloth

sustainability.materials: Responsibly harvested walnut wood with FSC certification
sustainability.packaging: Minimal packaging design with recycled materials

products.name: Executive Office Desk
products.description: Professional office desk with built-in storage and cable management system
products.shortDescription: A sophisticated workspace solution combining functionality with modern design

materials.name: Engineered Wood
materials.description: High-grade MDF with premium veneer finish for durability

materials.name: Steel Frame
materials.description: Powder-coated steel frame providing robust support

materials.name: Cable Management System
materials.description: Integrated wire management with soft-close ports

careInstructions: Clean with a soft, dry cloth
Use appropriate wood cleaner for deep cleaning
Avoid placing hot items directly on surface
Keep cables organized in management system

sustainability.materials: CARB-compliant engineered wood for low emissions

products.name: Executive Office Desk
products.description: Professional office desk with built-in storage and cable management
